subject: Experienced and Affordable Laser Vision Correction
body:

©2007 LCA-Vision Inc. Offer is subject to credit approval. No finance charges will be assessed if the amount in full is paid by the due date. A minimum monthly payment of 3% of the balance is required.Other financing options are available. Call for details.  FL Residents only: The patient and any other person responsible for payment has a right to refuse pay, cancel payment, 
or be reimbursed for payment for any other service, examination, or treatment that is performed as a result of and within 72 hours of responding to the advertisement for the free, discounted fee, or reduced fee 
service, examination, or treatment.
